column5: Our place is on the border of Plano, Richardson, Addison, and Carrollton. We are close to the highways to Downtown Dallas (20 mins), and walking distance to bus station. It is a very quiet, friendly, and safe neighborhood.   We are surrounded by restaurants, coffee shops, businesses, and Shopping Centers. UT-Dallas is 3 miles away. The Galleria is 4 miles away.   In addition to the private bedroom, we also have a full-size futon in the living room that can accommodate 2 guests.
column8: Comfy Bedroom with Private Bathroom Great Location
